trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported> event is included in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to support compatibility with Silverlight.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>evento è incluso in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] per supportare la compatibilità con Silverlight.</xref:System.Windows.Input.Touch.FrameReported>

trans-unit.source: If you do not have to ensure compatibility with Silverlight, use the touch events, such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>, on <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: Se non è necessario garantire la compatibilità con Silverlight, utilizzare gli eventi tocco, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove>via <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, <xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D>, o <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement3D> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.TouchDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the TouchFrameEventArgs to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> values that are relevant to the touch event.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il TouchFrameEventArgs per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>valori rilevanti per l'evento di tocco.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, you can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> of the touch and determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> was a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> action.
trans-unit.target: Dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>, è possibile ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A>del tocco e determinare se il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>è stato un <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>, o <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction>azione.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint.Position%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint> to get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>per ottenere il <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint>

trans-unit.source: From the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, you can determine the device <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> and get information about the element that is touched.
trans-unit.target: Dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>, è possibile determinare il dispositivo <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A>e ottenere informazioni sull'elemento toccato.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Id%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: Returns the current touch point of the primary touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il punto di tocco corrente del dispositivo primario tocco relativa all'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: In a set of active touch devices, the first device to be <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated> is the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: In un set attivo tocco dispositivi, il primo dispositivo deve essere <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>il dispositivo primario tocco.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice.Activated>

trans-unit.source: For example, if two fingers are touching the screen, the first finger that is down is represented by the primary touch device.
trans-unit.target: Se, ad esempio, due dita stanno toccando lo schermo, il primo dito inattivo è rappresentato dal dispositivo di tocco primario.

trans-unit.source: If the first finger is lifted while the second finger is still down, the primary touch device becomes `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il primo dito è elevato, mentre il secondo dito è ancora attivo, il dispositivo di tocco primario diventa `null`.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento che definisce lo spazio delle coordinate.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare le coordinate assolute WPF, specificare `relativeTo` come <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current position of the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> relative to the specified element; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the primary <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref> is not active.
trans-unit.target: La posizione corrente del database primario <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> relativa all'elemento specificato; o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il database primario <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref> non è attivo.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection that contains the current touch point for each active touch device relative to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta che contiene il punto di tocco corrente per ogni dispositivo active tocco relativa all'elemento specificato.

trans-unit.source: The element that defines the coordinate space.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento che definisce lo spazio delle coordinate.

trans-unit.source: To use WPF absolute coordinates, specify `relativeTo` as <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare le coordinate assolute WPF, specificare `relativeTo` come <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"></xref> for each active <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta che contiene l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchPoint"> </xref> ogni Active <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This member is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro non è implementato.

trans-unit.source: This method is provided for Silverlight compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è fornito per la compatibilità di Silverlight.

trans-unit.source: Because of device implementation differences, it is not implemented in WPF.
trans-unit.target: A causa delle differenze di implementazione di dispositivo, non è implementato in WPF.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il timestamp per questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The time stamp for this event.
trans-unit.target: Il timestamp per questo evento.
